basics.summary: Results-driven Senior Director / VP of Manufacturing & Operations with 20+ years of experience transforming complex operations in highly regulated environments (cGMP, FDA, USDA). Proven leader in scaling manufacturing, optimizing processes, building high-performing teams, and consistently delivering product "right first time". I believe that the pillars of operational excellence, which include **people**, **safety**, **quality**, **adherence**, **delivery** and **continuous improvement**, are the bedrock of any successful organization. I have strived to be an accomplished leader skilled at building systems and processes driven by continuous improvement as a framework to support short and long-term organizational goals.
